response.overview: Sammi Ultimate Collection includes 3 CDs and 2 DVDs, and the music CD contains 50 must-listen Sammi works, from the popular songs "Reluctant to You", "Don't Put It Down", "Elegy of Love" and so on. From "How to Cry" and "Our Theme Song" a few years ago, Sammi Cheng's most touching and unforgettable songs are always around! The album also selected the strongest dance and love songs in the past, and specially created two new remixes, namely "Pink Wonder Woman vs.​​  There are also 2 DVDs on the album, and 38 of the most exciting MVs of the calendar year are reproduced in front of you. The two DVDs are also based on one fast and one slow. The fast songs include 16 MVs such as "Beware of Women" and "Shake", while the slow DVDs include as many as 22 songs such as "I Don't Want You" and "Our Theme Song". The MV of the work is definitely the best choice for collection.
response.title: Sammi Ultimate Collection
